content: materials simply soft 11 skeins off white color a 3 skeins island blue color b *ed note there is no indication on the website about whether the required yarn is from 3 oz 165 yard or 6 oz 330 yard skeins definitive total yardage amount cannot be determined at this time * i have the original pattern from the caron yarn wrapper the required skeins were all 6 oz skeins size i crochet hook or size needed for gauge special terms trfp - triple crochet around post-front side trbp - triple crochet around post-back side basket weave panel make 2 twisted cabel panel make 2 woven shell panel make 1 join panels work end diamond panels crochet 3-round border to finish
